scripts.build: NODE_ENV=development VITE_RUNTIME_ENV=dev CRAWLER_DEBUG=true vue-tsc -b && NODE_ENV=development VITE_RUNTIME_ENV=dev CRAWLER_DEBUG=true vite build
scripts.build:watch: NODE_ENV=development VITE_RUNTIME_ENV=dev CRAWLER_DEBUG=true vite build --watch --mode development
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production VITE_RUNTIME_ENV=prod vue-tsc -b && NODE_ENV=production VITE_RUNTIME_ENV=prod vite build && bun scripts/clean-dist.cjs
scripts.lint: eslint . --no-cache --fix --max-warnings 0 --fix-type problem,suggestion,layout && echo '✅ ESLint: 所有问题已修复'
scripts.stylelint: stylelint "src/**/*.{css,scss,vue}" --no-cache --fix && echo '✅ Stylelint: 所有问题已修复'
